Title: Sherlock Gnomes
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Mystery, Romance
Writer: Ben Zazove (screenplay by), Andy Riley (story by), Kevin Cecil (story by), Emily Cook (story by), Kathy Greenberg (story by), Rob Sprackling (based on characters by), Johnny Smith (based on characters by), Andy Riley (based on characters by), Kevin Cecil (based on characters by), Kelly Asbury (based on characters by), Steve Hamilton Shaw
Actors: Kelly Asbury, Mary J. Blige, Emily Blunt, Julio Bonet
Plot: Garden gnomes, Gnomeo and Juliet, recruit renowned detective Sherlock Gnomes to investigate the mysterious disappearance of other garden ornaments.
